title: Plantain Chips
ingredients: 2  green plantains, peeled and sliced 1/8-inch thick
method: Step 1: Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Step 2: Deep fry the plantain slices, about a dozen at a time, until golden brown on both sides, 3 to 4 minutes. Drain in a large bowl lined with paper towels, and salt to taste while still warm.
